org.apache.avalon.framework.CascadingThrowable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConnectionResetException, ResourceNotFoundException
public class ProcessingException
extends org.apache.avalon.framework.CascadingException

This Exception is thrown every time there is a problem in processing a request.

Version:
CVS $Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2002/01/03 12:31:06 $
Author:
Pierpaolo Fumagalli (Apache Software Foundation, Exoffice Technologies)
